name: The Bear, the Cat and the Rabbit
name_original: The Bear, the Cat and the Rabbit
description:
"The Bear, the Cat and the Rabbit" is a short adventure with couple "think outside the box" puzzles. You control three anthropomorphic animals on a strange quest in abandoned yet hostile environment. All this in semi-isometric, 16-bit retro style.

The game itself is a prequel to comic book of the same title

Controls:

W/S/A/D run Z action X summon others SPACE jump and roll TAB/1/2/3/wheel change character 1st mouse button go to click position 2nd mouse button
 tell others to go there F7/F8/F9 save/quicksave/load
